name: zigy-demo-store
description: A demo online store with Admin functions.

scripts.dev: cd frontend && npm start & cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.start: cd backend && npm i && npm start & cd frontend && npm i && npm start --prefix dist
scripts.frontend-deploy: git subtree push --prefix frontend/dist heroku-front master
scripts.backend-deploy: git subtree push --prefix backend heroku-back master

author: Adesuwa Tolu Dawodu
